metadata.title: CVE-2023-35703 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple stack-based buffer overflow vulnerabilities exist in the FSTLEB128 varint functionality of GTKWave 3.3.115. A specially crafted .fstfile can lead to arbitrary code execution. A victim would need to open amalicious file to trigger these vulnerabilities.This vulnerability concernsthe fstReaderVarint64 function.

criterions.comment: gtkwave package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
